actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 403(b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, to permit the continuation of youth fares.

summary.text: Provides that any air carrier, may grant reduced rate transportation to individuals aged 21 and younger, upon such terms and conditions as the Civil Aeronautics Board may prescribe. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1373(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 403(b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, to permit the continuation of youth fares.
